SELECT /* etMbrBase.mbrSchListBase */ MBR_NO , MBR_NM , LOGIN_ID , MBR_GB_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('ME001', MBR_GB_CD) AS MBR_GB_NM , MBR_MGR_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('ME002', MBR_MGR_CD) AS MBR_MGR_NM , MBR_STAT_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('ME003', MBR_STAT_CD) AS MBR_STAT_NM , MBR_GRADE_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('ME024', MBR_GRADE_CD) AS MBR_GRADE_NM , TEL_RGN_NO , TEL_TXNO_NO , TEL_END_NO , CASE COALESCE(TEL_RGN_NO,'') || COALESCE(TEL_TXNO_NO, '') || COALESCE(TEL_END_NO, '') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE COALESCE(TEL_RGN_NO,'') || '-' || COALESCE(TEL_TXNO_NO, '') || '-' || COALESCE(TEL_END_NO, '') END AS TEL_NO , CELL_SCT_NO , CELL_TXNO_NO , CELL_END_NO , CASE COALESCE(CELL_SCT_NO,'') || COALESCE(CELL_TXNO_NO, '') || COALESCE(CELL_END_NO, '') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE COALESCE(CELL_SCT_NO,'') || '-' || COALESCE(CELL_TXNO_NO, '') || '-' || COALESCE(CELL_END_NO, '') END AS CELL_NO , EMAIL_ADDR , ZIP_NO_SEQ , ZIP_NO , ZIP_ADDR , DTL_ADDR FROM ET_MBR_BASE WHERE MBR_GB_CD = '10' AND LOGIN_ID LIKE #{loginId} || '%' AND MBR_NM LIKE #{mbrNm} || '%' AND MBR_GRADE_CD LIKE #{mbrGradeCd} || '%' AND COALESCE(EMAIL_ADDR, '') LIKE #{emailAddr} || '%' AND MBR_STAT_CD LIKE #{mbrStatCd} || '%'
AND ( COALESCE(TEL_END_NO, '') LIKE #{contactNo} || '%' OR COALESCE(CELL_END_NO, '') LIKE #{contactNo} || '%' )
AND ( COALESCE(TEL_RGN_NO,'') || COALESCE(TEL_TXNO_NO, '') || COALESCE(TEL_END_NO, '') LIKE #{contactNo} || '%' OR COALESCE(CELL_SCT_NO,'') || COALESCE(CELL_TXNO_NO, '') || COALESCE(CELL_END_NO, '') LIKE #{contactNo} || '%' )
ORDER BY MBR_NO DESC

SELECT /* etMbrBase.customerMgmtView */ MBR_NO , MBR_NM , LOGIN_ID , MBR_MGR_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('ME002', MBR_MGR_CD) AS MBR_MGR_NM , MBR_STAT_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('ME003', MBR_STAT_CD) AS MBR_STAT_NM , MBR_GRADE_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('ME024', MBR_GRADE_CD) AS MBR_GRADE_NM , TEL_RGN_NO , TEL_TXNO_NO , TEL_END_NO , CASE COALESCE(TEL_RGN_NO,'') || COALESCE(TEL_TXNO_NO, '') || COALESCE(TEL_END_NO, '') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE COALESCE(TEL_RGN_NO,'') || '-' || COALESCE(TEL_TXNO_NO, '') || '-' || COALESCE(TEL_END_NO, '') END AS TEL_NO , CELL_SCT_NO , CELL_TXNO_NO , CELL_END_NO , CASE COALESCE(CELL_SCT_NO,'') || COALESCE(CELL_TXNO_NO, '') || COALESCE(CELL_END_NO, '') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE COALESCE(CELL_SCT_NO,'') || '-' || COALESCE(CELL_TXNO_NO, '') || '-' || COALESCE(CELL_END_NO, '') END AS CELL_NO , EMAIL_ADDR , ZIP_NO_SEQ , ZIP_NO , ZIP_ADDR , DTL_ADDR , ZIP_ADDR || ' ' || DTL_ADDR AS ADDRESS , TO_CHAR(SYS_REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_MOD_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM ET_MBR_BASE WHERE MBR_GB_CD = '10' AND MBR_MGR_CD LIKE #{condxMbrMgrCd} || '%' AND MBR_STAT_CD LIKE #{condxMbrStatCd} || '%'
AND LOGIN_ID LIKE #{condxMbrValue} || '%'
AND MBR_NM LIKE #{condxMbrValue} || '%'
AND SYS_REG_DTM BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{condxSysRegDtmStt}||' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(#{condxSysRegDtmEnd}||' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND COALESCE(TEL_RGN_NO,'') || COALESCE(TEL_TXNO_NO, '') || COALESCE(TEL_END_NO, '') LIKE #{condxTelNo} || '%' AND COALESCE(CELL_SCT_NO,'') || COALESCE(CELL_TXNO_NO, '') || COALESCE(CELL_END_NO, '') LIKE #{condxCellNo} || '%' ORDER BY SYS_REG_DTM DESC

FN_GET_CODENAME('ME002', TA.MBR_MGR_CD) AS MBR_MGR_NM , TA.BMAN_NO , TA.CORPN_RPSTMN_NM , TA.CORPN_AEMP_NM , TA.CORPN_AEMP_DEPT_NM , TA.CORPN_FAX_NO , TA.EMP_NO , TA.DEPT_NM , TA.ENTCMP_DT , TA.RESIGN_DT , TA.MBR_STAT_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('ME003', TA.MBR_STAT_CD) AS MBR_STAT_NM , TA.LGC_MBR_NO , TA.MBR_GRADE_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('ME024', TA.MBR_GRADE_CD) AS MBR_GRADE_NM , TA.SOLAR_YN , CASE COALESCE(TA.TEL_RGN_NO,'') || COALESCE(TA.TEL_TXNO_NO, '') || COALESCE(TA.TEL_END_NO, '') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE COALESCE(TA.TEL_RGN_NO,'') || '-' || COALESCE(TA.TEL_TXNO_NO, '') || '-' || hh24:mi:ss') AS MBR_JOIN_DTM , TO_CHAR(TA.FRST_ORD_DTM,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS FRST_ORD_DTM , TO_CHAR(TA.LST_ORD_DTM,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS LST_ORD_DTM , TO_CHAR(TA.FRST_LOGIN_DTM,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS FRST_LOGIN_DTM , TO_CHAR(TA.LST_LOGIN_DTM,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS LST_LOGIN_DTM , TA.PWD_ERR_CNT , TA.SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(TA.SYS_REG_DTM,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS SYS_REG_DTM , TA.SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(TA.SYS_MOD_DTM,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS SYS_MOD_DTM , TB.MBR_WDRA_CAUS_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('ME006', TB.MBR_WDRA_CAUS_CD) AS MBR_WDRA_CAUS_NM FROM ET_MBR_BASE TA INNER JOIN ET_MBR_DTL_INFO TB ON TA.MBR_NO = TB.MBR_NO WHERE TA.MBR_NO = #{mbrNo}

SELECT /* etMbrBase.getCustomerDeliveryInfoByMbrNoList */ MBR_NO , MBR_DLVP_SEQ , DLVP_NM , RCVMN_NM , BASE_DLVP_YN , USE_YN , USER_SORT_SEQ , ZIP_NO_SEQ , ZIP_NO , ZIP_ADDR , DTL_ADDR , TEL_RGN_NO , TEL_TXNO_NO , TEL_END_NO , CASE COALESCE(TEL_RGN_NO,'') || COALESCE(TEL_TXNO_NO, '') || COALESCE(TEL_END_NO, '') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE COALESCE(TEL_RGN_NO,'') || '-' || COALESCE(TEL_TXNO_NO, '') || '-' || COALESCE(TEL_END_NO, '') END AS TEL_NO , CELL_SCT_NO , CELL_TXNO_NO , CELL_END_NO , CASE COALESCE(CELL_SCT_NO,'') || COALESCE(CELL_TXNO_NO, '') || COALESCE(CELL_END_NO, '') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE COALESCE(CELL_SCT_NO,'') || '-' || COALESCE(CELL_TXNO_NO, '') || '-' || COALESCE(CELL_END_NO, '') END AS CELL_NO , SYS_REG_ID , SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , SYS_MOD_DTM FROM ET_MBR_DLVP_INFO WHERE MBR_NO = #{mbrNo}

SELECT /* etMbrBase.getCustomerTermsAgreeInfoByMbrNoSiteNoList */ TA.MBR_NO , TA.SITE_NO , TA.EMAIL_RECV_AGR_YN , TA.SMS_RECV_AGR_YN , TA.APP_PUSH_AGR_YN , TA.AUTO_LOGIN_AGR_YN , TA.MOBL_RECT_AGR_YN , TA.SYS_REG_ID , TA.SYS_REG_DTM , TA.SYS_MOD_ID , TA.SYS_MOD_DTM , TB.SITE_NM FROM ET_MBR_SVC_AGR_INFO TA INNER JOIN CC_SITE_BASE TB ON TA.SITE_NO = TB.SITE_NO WHERE TA.MBR_NO = #{mbrNo} AND TA.SITE_NO = #{siteNo}
mapper.sql: SELECT /* etMbrBase.mbrDlvpInfo */ MBR_NO , MBR_DLVP_SEQ , DLVP_NM , RCVMN_NM , BASE_DLVP_YN , USE_YN , USER_SORT_SEQ , ZIP_NO_SEQ , ZIP_NO , ZIP_ADDR , DTL_ADDR , TEL_RGN_NO , TEL_TXNO_NO , TEL_END_NO , CASE COALESCE(TEL_RGN_NO,'') || COALESCE(TEL_TXNO_NO, '') || COALESCE(TEL_END_NO, '') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE COALESCE(TEL_RGN_NO,'') || '-' || COALESCE(TEL_TXNO_NO, '') || '-' || COALESCE(TEL_END_NO, '') END AS TEL_NO , CELL_SCT_NO , CELL_TXNO_NO , CELL_END_NO , CASE COALESCE(CELL_SCT_NO,'') || COALESCE(CELL_TXNO_NO, '') || COALESCE(CELL_END_NO, '') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE COALESCE(CELL_SCT_NO,'') || '-' || COALESCE(CELL_TXNO_NO, '') || '-' || COALESCE(CELL_END_NO, '') END AS CELL_NO , SYS_REG_ID , SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , SYS_MOD_DTM FROM ET_MBR_DLVP_INFO WHERE MBR_NO = #{mbrNo}

SELECT /* etMbrBase.customerTermsAgreeHistoryByMbrNoSiteNo */ AGR_CHG_HIST_SEQ , MBR_NO , SITE_NO , SVC_AGR_TYP_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('ME025', SVC_AGR_TYP_CD) AS SVC_AGR_TYP_NM , AGR_YN , SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_REG_DTM,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS SYS_REG_DTM FROM ET_MBR_AGR_CHG_HIST WHERE MBR_NO = #{mbrNo} AND SITE_NO = #{siteNo}
mapper.select: SELECT /* etMbrBase.getCustomerRefundAccountInfoByMemberNo */ MBR_NO , RFD_BANK_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('OM026', RFD_BANK_CD) AS RFD_BANK_NM , RFD_ACTN_NO , RFD_ACTN_DEPOSITOR_NM , RFD_ACTN_CERTI_YN , SYS_REG_ID , SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , SYS_MOD_DTM FROM ET_MBR_RFD_ACTN_INFO WHERE MBR_NO = #{mbrNo}
mapper.sql: SELECT /* etMbrBase.etMbrGradeHistByMbrNo */ MBR_NO , MBR_GRADE_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('ME024', MBR_GRADE_CD) AS MBR_GRADE_NM , TO_CHAR(HIST_STR_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS HIST_STR_DTM FROM ET_MBR_GRADE_HIST WHERE MBR_NO = #{mbrNo}

SELECT /* etMbrBase.watchCustomerSearchByViewCondition */ TA.MGR_MBR_NO , TA.MBR_NO , TA.MGR_GB_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('ME019', TA.MGR_GB_CD) AS MGR_GB_NM , TA.MGR_TYP_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('ME009', TA.MGR_TYP_CD) AS MGR_TYP_NM , TA.REG_CAUS_CONT , TA.ORD_NO , TO_CHAR(TA.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM , TO_CHAR(TA.RVC_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS RVC_DTM , TA.MGR_MBR_REG_ID , TA.MGR_MBR_RVC_ID , TA.SYS_REG_ID , TA.SYS_REG_DTM , TA.SYS_MOD_ID , TA.SYS_MOD_DTM , TB.MBR_NM , TB.LOGIN_ID FROM ET_MGR_MBR_INFO TA INNER JOIN ET_MBR_BASE TB ON TA.MBR_NO = TB.MBR_NO WHERE TB.MBR_GB_CD = '10' AND TA.MGR_GB_CD LIKE #{condxMgrGbCd} || '%' AND TA.MGR_TYP_CD LIKE #{condxMgrTypCd} || '%' AND LOGIN_ID LIKE #{condxLoginId} || '%' AND MBR_NM LIKE #{condxMbrNm} || '%'
AND TA.REG_DTM BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{condxSysRegDtmStt}||' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(#{condxSysRegDtmEnd}||' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
mapper.select: SELECT /* etMbrBase.getCustomerDetailOrderCallCountByMemberNo */ TA.MBR_NO , TA.MBR_NM , TA.LOGIN_ID , TA.MBR_GRADE_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('ME024', TA.MBR_GRADE_CD) AS MBR_GRADE_NM , 0 AS ORD_CNT , 0 AS CALL_CNT FROM ET_MBR_BASE TA WHERE TA.MBR_NO = #{mbrNo}
mapper.sql: SELECT /* etMbrBase.watchCustomerByMbrNo */ TA.MGR_MBR_NO , TA.MBR_NO , TA.MGR_GB_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('ME019', TA.MGR_GB_CD) AS MGR_GB_NM , TA.MGR_TYP_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('ME009', TA.MGR_TYP_CD) AS MGR_TYP_NM , TA.REG_CAUS_CONT , TA.ORD_NO , TO_CHAR(TA.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM , TO_CHAR(TA.RVC_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS RVC_DTM , TA.MGR_MBR_REG_ID , TA.MGR_MBR_RVC_ID , TA.SYS_REG_ID , TA.SYS_REG_DTM , TA.SYS_MOD_ID , TA.SYS_MOD_DTM FROM ET_MGR_MBR_INFO TA WHERE TA.MBR_NO = #{mbrNo}

SELECT /* etMbrBase.sqlDormantCustomerSearch */ MBR_NO , MBR_NM , LOGIN_ID , MBR_MGR_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('ME002', MBR_MGR_CD) AS MBR_MGR_NM , MBR_STAT_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('ME003', MBR_STAT_CD) AS MBR_STAT_NM , MBR_GRADE_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('ME024', MBR_GRADE_CD) AS MBR_GRADE_NM , TEL_RGN_NO , TEL_TXNO_NO , TEL_END_NO , CASE COALESCE(TEL_RGN_NO,'') || COALESCE(TEL_TXNO_NO, '') || COALESCE(TEL_END_NO, '') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE COALESCE(TEL_RGN_NO,'') || '-' || COALESCE(TEL_TXNO_NO, '') || '-' || COALESCE(TEL_END_NO, '') END AS TEL_NO , CELL_SCT_NO , CELL_TXNO_NO , CELL_END_NO , CASE COALESCE(CELL_SCT_NO,'') || COALESCE(CELL_TXNO_NO, '') || COALESCE(CELL_END_NO, '') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE COALESCE(CELL_SCT_NO,'') || '-' || COALESCE(CELL_TXNO_NO, '') || '-' || COALESCE(CELL_END_NO, '') END AS CELL_NO , EMAIL_ADDR , ZIP_NO_SEQ , ZIP_NO , ZIP_ADDR , DTL_ADDR , ZIP_ADDR || ' ' || DTL_ADDR AS ADDRESS , TO_CHAR(SYS_REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_MOD_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM ET_MBR_BASE WHERE MBR_GB_CD = '10' AND MBR_STAT_CD = '20'
AND LOGIN_ID LIKE #{condxLoginId} || '%'
AND MBR_NM LIKE #{condxMbrNm} || '%'
AND COALESCE(TEL_RGN_NO,'') || COALESCE(TEL_TXNO_NO, '') || COALESCE(TEL_END_NO, '') LIKE #{condxTelNo} || '%'
AND COALESCE(CELL_SCT_NO,'') || COALESCE(CELL_TXNO_NO, '') || COALESCE(CELL_END_NO, '') LIKE #{condxCellNo} || '%'
AND SYS_MOD_DTM BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{condxSysRegDtmStt}||' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(#{condxSysRegDtmEnd}||' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
ORDER BY SYS_REG_DTM DESC
mapper.select: /* etMbrBase."getMemberData" */ SELECT MBR_NO , MBR_NM , MBR_GB_CD , MBR_MGR_CD , LOGIN_ID , TEL_RGN_NO , TEL_TXNO_NO , TEL_END_NO , CELL_SCT_NO , CELL_TXNO_NO , CELL_END_NO , FN_GET_CODENAME('ME002', EMB.MBR_MGR_CD) AS MBR_MGR_NM , FN_GET_CODENAME('ME024', EMB.MBR_GRADE_CD) AS MBR_GRADE_NM , EMB.MBR_GRADE_CD , EMAIL_ADDR , ZIP_NO_SEQ , ZIP_NO , ZIP_ADDR , DTL_ADDR FROM ET_MBR_BASE EMB WHERE MBR_NO = #{mbrNo}
